, talk of the former Pussycat Doll's possible arrival has apparently got Cheryl worried she will be eclipsed by her if they do work together on the series. A source told the Daily Mirror newspaper: Cheryl's been straight with Simon Cowell but suddenly people aren't returning her calls. She doesn't want to get into a put-up scrap with Nicole Scherzinger with Simon Cowell playing the puppet master. Although he wants Nicole Scherzinger , Simon Cowell still hasn't made a final decision on the line-up and his stalling is said to be concerning TV chiefs who want the judging panel to be signed off.

. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. The U.S. and other countries charge that China keeps its currency artificially low to maintain an export advantage. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. executive chairman, "a lot of my time" will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. "We've got very complicated government issues," he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
